pageContext.claim: “We were rewarded with a victory. Now, let's see whether or not somebody has the courage -- whether it's a legislator or legislatures, or whether it's a justice of the Supreme Court or a number of justices of the Supreme Court. Let's see if they have the courage to do what everybody in this country knows is right.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump continues to offer false hope to his supporters that he can be declared the winner of the election.
